SELECT p10_assets_re.assets_re_id, p10_assets_re.assets_re_detail, p10_assets.assets_id, p10_assets.assets_name, p10_assets.owner, p10_assets.type, p10_assets.assets_type, p10_assets.account_number, p10_casee.casee_id, p10_casee.`status` FROM p10_assets_re LEFT JOIN p10_casee ON p10_assets_re.casee_id = p10_casee.casee_id and p10_casee.del_flag = 0 LEFT JOIN p10_assets ON p10_assets_re.assets_id = p10_assets.assets_id and p10_assets.del_flag = 0 WHERE p10_assets_re.del_flag = 0 AND p10_assets_re.casee_id IS NOT NULL
AND p10_assets_re.casee_id = #{query.caseeId}
AND p10_assets.assets_name like concat('%',#{query.assetsName},'%')
AND p10_assets.owner like concat('%',#{query.owner},'%')
AND p10_assets.account_number like concat('%',#{query.accountNumber},'%')
AND json_extract( p10_assets_re.assets_re_detail, '$.assetsSeizure.seizureExpiryDate' ) BETWEEN DATE_FORMAT(#{query.beginDate}, '%Y-%m-%d 00:00:00') and DATE_FORMAT(#{query.endDate}, '%Y-%m-%d 23:59:59')
